Nightshift blinks his headlights in response to Nighlights reply.

" I prom=
ise, the training takes a while but once ya go through it, it'll stick with=
 ya for ages.  You'll be able ta defend yourself no matter if ya got energy=
 weapons or not.  Your body,mind and spark become your most powerful defens=
e.  You'll see when I do a few demo rounds with you guys." 

He chuckles qu=
ietly.

" let's hope Rodimus joins in and pays attention this time."

Perpe=
tually on the move and constantly busy. 

On Jul 29, 2011, at 12:39 AM, Air=
shadow Nightstar <airly2002@...> wrote:

> Nighlight:
>  
> =E2=80=
=9CI could shoot energy balls from my hands... Just that=E2=80=9Dwhispered =
the femme and she added=E2=80=9CI was captured by predacons two times, cout=
ing the last one and reprogramed. In the first one I was involved in the de=
fence of the base... I wasnt the most skilled cause I was captured again wh=
ile I was defending it. =E2=80=9Dthen she added =E2=80=9CLet=E2=80=99s do t=
his...=E2=80=9D
>  
>  
>  
>

> Sent: Thursday, July=
 28, 2011 8:24 AM

> 
> 
> Nightshift listens thoughtfully.  Being a Pretender himself, he to=
o was vexed between factions as he would often have to fight against his ow=
n faction when in the company of Decepticon forces.  He could feel her pain=
 and flashes his parking lights in response. 
>  
> " I sure know where you=
're comm'n from.  Way back when, when the cons didn't know my true faction,=
 I'd have ta take out my bot buddies when I was supposedly in the company o=
f Decepticon forces, just so that I didn't get suspected of treason.  Slag =
was that a nail in my tires.  I hated every minute of  those battles.  And =
what was worse, the times when the cons won their battles because of someth=
'n I did.  That hurt more than anything else.  Still does, because sooner o=
r later I'm gonna have ta do it all over again.  I really don't wanna do th=
at but, if we're gonna get the edge on the cons, it may be up ta me ta put =
on the pretender routine again.  But this time I'm gonna have ta make it lo=
ok real.  And it might involve me tak'n out one of our own in order ta get =
back the trust of the cons.  I really don't wanna go that route and I hope =
none of the bosses asks me ta do that.  I dunno if Tucson would ask but I g=
ot a funny feel'n that Leo or Rodimus might.  I hope it doesn't turn out th=
at way but I cant do anything about that."
> 
> He sighs.
> 
> " If there w=
as a way ta get rid of my Decepticon badge, I'd have it removed in a spark =
beat."  
> 
> Perpetually on the move and constantly busy.
>

am for ya. Hmm, maybe Rodimus might wanna join in on it too.. It's a

gs

r level

is type of

lotta dexterity

t makes even Tucson

Commander. It's a 
>> difference Hydras has no inclination how ta fend off.=
 THAT'S the direction 
>> Tucson is gonna take, and if you guys were traine=

>> to ya."
